name: Dreamville Special
description: Upon use, one of the following effects will be randomly applied to all allies in the next battle: Clockie's Whirlwind Fruit Tea — ATK increases by 36%. Brother Hanu's Boba Tea — CRIT Rate increases by 18%. Mr. Soda's Orange-Peel Latte — CRIT DMG increases by 36%.
story:
A limited-edition version of Dreamville-themed drinks, offered exclusively in Clock Studios Theme Park. The flavors are random but are all very impressive.

"...What's this flavor!? It's so weird... But I just wanna take another sip!"
